website_summaries.verdict: A collapsible golf chipping net that you can use indoors or outdoors.
pros: Designed for golfers of all ages and skill levels
Portable, lightweight net can be stored in golf bag
Comes with 4 stakes to help hold net in windy conditions
cons: Sometimes can be hard to take apart and fit inside of bag

customer_reviews.title: This is epic!
customer_reviews.text: We will teach this dog to retrieve balls!! Husband loving his Xmas gifts. Thank you so much 😊😊
customer_reviews.author: John Hankinson

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Dad
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my Dad for Christmas because he is very much into golf. He took it out to practice "chipping" in the yard and was an instant fan. Happy that I gifted this to him, and he is happy too:)
customer_reviews.author: surfernurse77

customer_reviews.title: Solid Chipping Net
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a different chipping net that turned out to be terrible. I returned it immediately and bought this one. I'm extremely happy that I did. This one arrived today and is well made. Perfect for real practice with real golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. Good purchase for chipping and limited practice space. I recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Smaller targets than expected but does the trick for Shoet game practice
customer_reviews.author: IDB

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chiping net and when it came there was a small defect. I contacted Spornia and within 4 days they had corrected the defect. I love the chiping net and it is working exactly as advertized. Not only did I get a great product but I also received awesome customer service. Thanks Spornia
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: This product is helpful and fun. We practice our chipping in family room with the recommended soft balls. We haven’t broken anything yet
customer_reviews.author: Crayon

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for home, office or the RV! So many ways to use - golf, bean bags, ball toss. Kids and adults liked so much we bought two more for gifts. Excellent customer service. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Portable with included small bag. Wish they thought to make that bag with a flap or zipper bc the two metal props keep falling Out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dex Tex

customer_reviews.title: I may have misread, but the net was just ...
customer_reviews.text: I may have misread, but the net was just one big net, no separation options as shown in the picture. My husband still really enjoys using it out back though!
customer_reviews.author: cass.renee

customer_reviews.title: Its not bad but could be better
customer_reviews.text: It was way smaller than I thought. Its not a bad product but not as good as the reviews. The customer service is quick with questions but not sure if it is overzealous sales staff. It will work for chipping in backyard but still need to test out its durability. Very minimal packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kobe4eva

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to set up! Nice and sturdy for chipping, comes in a nice little carrying bag! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: It is helping our short game.
customer_reviews.text: This has been great! My husband and I are working on our short game until we get back to golfing as we just retired.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Cockrell

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for golfers
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dadfor a Christmas/Birthday gift and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kittel

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband’s birthday and he loves it. Easy to fold up and store away. Great for practicing too. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Schriver

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: well made with top grade materials, easy to set up and take down. Great addition to have for your golf training, love it and will recommend thanks Spornia.Ed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: acceptable function
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for 13yr. old boy on a golf team for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: dixie hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Brother loved his Christmas gift and can't wait to use it. Exact match to picture.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a week so far so good, i'm enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was super fast; got it before expected
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was super fast; got it before expected. My boyfriend loves it. Very easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Pallares

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad for the rainy/snowy weather. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice!
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter is a golfer and this will help her during the off season with her swing!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the golfer in your life. I think the other family golfers were a bit jealous!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend as a birthday gift. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Avery Haines

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: This golf product is really well made and designed. I am impressed. There is room for people that obviously love golf and want to be the best. I bought three nets (10, 20 and 30 yard chipping). Excited!
customer_reviews.author: garry dauron

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. My husband uses it in the house & it holds up extremely well
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you’re paying for.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and storage. Be honest, your short game sucks as bad as mine. This is great for practicing the short game. It'll save you strokes on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Weekend Golfer

customer_reviews.title: I like this item
customer_reviews.text: I like this item, easy to set up and use. The only thing I don't like is trying to get it back in the bag. ugh I bought a golf mat too so I could use it in my hall. Would be nice if a mat was included.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good Net... Towel NOT Included
customer_reviews.text: Net was advertised to include the "Scrub Patch Towel". Towel was NOT included. Although I did not purchase the net for the towel, it was expected to be included. I normally do not submit bad reviews; however, after I received the item I recommended they adjust their product information to reflect the issue. I never heard anything back and the product is still being advertised to include the towel. The net performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete product or merchandise
customer_reviews.text: I did not received the complete merchandise. The detach target in red is missing. Very upset
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Colon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Practice Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great net for indoors or out. I use it to help with my short game and it's portable, sets up in seconds, and is quality all the way. I also like to use it to toss balls with my grand kids. We pick out a different hole for points and it makes a great game for little ones. It will help your golf scores drop, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Birdielove

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the features of this hitting net. Very easy to install. Love that the balls are returned automatically to your feet. I have mine installed outdoors. When I am doing using it, I remove the two bars and let it lay flat. This makes my wife happy. Takes less than a minute to raise it backup for use
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and durable product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 3 weeks now and have zero complaints. It looks like it will last for several years based off the material its constructed from. The seller even included a chipping net and a huge bag of tees, which wasn't included in the listing. Needless to say this is more than worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Good Size Net
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the chipping net. What separates this from others is the size and differing zones to shoot for. Built solid and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: no29

product_meta.title: Spornia Pop Up Golf Chipping Net- Indoor and Outdoor Golf Practice Training- 25 in. Collapsible Chip Shot Net (2 in 1 Target)
feature_bullets: Sharpen your chipping accuracy! Features three targets to sharpen your chipping accuracy
Two-in-one option to remove targets to chip into a larger target area. Use for Indoor and Outdoor (Includes 4 metal ground stakes)
Instant set up and take down. Collapses into a 12 in. circle diameter
Dimensions: 25 in. x 25 in. | Made with durable, sturdy spring steel frame.
We are based in the U.S. with full customer service. One year warranty on broken frames or cracks
